mapper.sql: id, category_id , name, code, unit_id , price, pics, description, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), creater, owner_id , status, sells, sort, is_delete , source, top_time , is_promotion

g.category_id categoryId,g.name ,g.code ,g.unit_id unitId,g.price ,g.pics ,g.description ,DATE_FORMAT(g.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime,g.creater ,g.owner_id ownerId,g.status ,g.sells ,g.sort ,g.is_delete isDelete,g.source ,DATE_FORMAT(g.top_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') topTime,g.is_promotion isPromotion
left join t_unit u on u.id = g.unitId left join t_promotion tp on tp.goods_id = g.id left join t_specs ts on ts.goods_id = g.id

,tp.id promotionId ,tp.money promotionMoney,DATE_FORMAT(tp.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') startTime,DATE_FORMAT(tp.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') endTime ,(g.isPromotion = 1 and now() >= tp.start_time and now() < tp.end_time) isPromotion ,u.name measurementUnit ,ts.name spec_name, ts.id spec_id
,((select ifnull(sum(ggss.in_amount),0) from t_goods_storage ggss where ggss.goods_id = g.id) - (select ifnull(sum(oocc.goods_num),0) from t_order_child oocc,t_order oo where oo.id = oocc.order_id and oo.status in (1,2,3,10) and oocc.goods_id = g.id)) as storage

update.if: update t_goods set top_time = #{top_time} where id = #{id}
update t_goods set status = #{status} where id = #{id}

mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,a.code,a.unit_id unitId,a.`status`,a.price,a.pics,a.is_promotion isPromotion,a.description,a.sells,a.sort,a.source,a.category_id categoryId,a.creater,a.create_time createTime,b.money as promotionMoney,b.start_time startTime,b.end_time endTime,c.`name` as specsName ,d.`name` categoryName, IFNULL(e.after_storage,0) stock ,IFNULL(e.baseline,0) from t_goods a LEFT JOIN t_promotion b on a.id = b.goods_id LEFT JOIN (select GROUP_CONCAT(name) name,goods_id from t_specs GROUP BY goods_id) c on a.id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_category d on a.category_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_goods_storage e on a.id = e.goods_id where 1=1 and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
